name: Cyber Dan
description:
It lacks empathy. It lacks morality. It lacks conscience. 

It is the mindless husk of a man, whose ignorant lust for power drove him into a being without any principled significance.

You are alone in this labyrinth of familiar yet disarranged halls. It will find you if you cannot hide. Complete the required assignments to progress, or you could find yourself becoming a permanent resident of the facility. Shut it down if you can, but you only have one main goal: survival.

 Cyber Dan features completely original sound design, models, textures, and music, and is being developed by two beginner developers. 

Controls:

MovementWASDSprintLeft ShiftCrouchLeft Ctrl/CLean left/Lean rightQ/EInventory/ObjectiveTabFlashlightLeft Click/RInteractFFire Taser(When equipped)Right Click

Gameplay: Each section/level has a unique order of tasks that you must complete in order to progress. To help you, there are items placed throughout the map that you can use.

However, it will do anything it can to catch you. You must continuously hide and run while completing the tasks given to you.

The demo is released now and contains two of the levels from the first chapter. This game is still pretty early in development so feedback would be greatly appreciated!
